items.title_original: HSM: The Original Tiering Engine Behind Mainframes, Cloud, and S3
items.title_neutral: HSM: The Original Tiering Engine Behind Mainframes, Cloud, and S3
items.excerpt: Hierarchical Storage Management (HSM) is the storage world‚Äôs oldest magic trick. It makes expensive storage look bigger by quietly moving data to cheaper tiers. HSM has five moving parts: a primary tier, secondary tiers, a policy engine, a recall mechanism, and a migration engine.
